contents-list.explanation: a large are of water that is surrounded by land
samples: They own a cottage by the lake.

contents-list.explanation: one of many reptiles that lived on Earth millions of years ago
samples: Pictures of dinosaurs were shown in Jurassic Park.

contents-list.explanation: an amount that is more than 2000
samples: Thousands of people visited the shrine.
I've seen that movie hundreds of times.

contents-list.explanation: a description of how something happened
samples: The movie is based on a true story.

contents-list.explanation: an fact or piece of information that is kept hidden from other people
samples: Don't tell him about the party, it's a secret.
Where they went is a mystery.

contents-list.explanation: to have a home in a specified place
a city in which the main offices of a government are located
a structure, such as a house, hospital, school, etc. with a roof and walls that is used as a place for people to live, work, do activities, store things, etc.
samples: My office is in that small brick building.

contents-list.explanation: attracting your attention and making you want to learn more about something or to be involved in something.
samples: This is one of the most interesting books I've read all year.
